trends: There has been one other sighting in Williston
There were no other sightings in Williston on or around March 5th 2011
Summary: while driving I saw 4 craft 3 white 1 red shaped like large buses with stream line front
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw the 4 craft about 300 yards from the road no more than 200 feet in the air over a large cow pasture and high far away in the sky I saw a bright light like a portal is a close as I can describe it. They were stacked 2 white red and white on the bottom. They had space in between them. There was no sound I could hear and they were hardly moving at all. They were gone in a split second.
